issue.title: [Packaging] Source archive can't be extracted by bsdtar on MSYS2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3034](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3034). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's caused by `python/cmake_modules`. It's symlink. It seems that bsdtar on MSYS2 can't handle symlink.

Note that GNU tar can extract and `python/cmake_modules`'s symlink is resolved.
